thread.title: BRIEF-New Home Co Announces Authorization Of $15 Mln Stock Repurchase Program

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-New Home Co Announces Authorization Of $15 Mln Stock Repurchase Program
text:
May 14 (Reuters) - New Home Company Inc:
* THE NEW HOME COMPANY ANNOUNCES AUTHORIZATION OF $15 MILLION STOCK REPURCHASE PROGRAM
* NEW HOME COMPANY - INTENDS TO RETIRE ANY SHARES REPURCHASED Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
